match.subtitle: Do the dead frighten you?
match.quote: Do the dead frighten you

match.subtitle: They won't trouble us no more.
match.quote: They shan’t trouble us no more

match.subtitle: Your dead men seem to have moved camp.
match.quote: Your dead men seem to have moved camp Will

match.subtitle: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, the first of his name...
match.quote: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon the First of his Name King of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm by the word of Eddard of the House Stark Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North I do sentence you to die

match.subtitle: Don't look away.
match.quote: And don’t look away

match.subtitle: King of the Andals and the First Men...
match.quote: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon the First of his Name King of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm by the word of Eddard of the House Stark Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North I do sentence you to die

match.subtitle: Father will know if you do.
match.quote: Father will know if you do

match.subtitle: Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and protector of the realm, I, Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, sentence you to die.
match.quote: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon the First of his Name King of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm by the word of Eddard of the House Stark Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North I do sentence you to die

match.subtitle: You did well.
match.quote: You did well

match.subtitle: You understand why I did it?
match.quote: Do you understand why I did it

match.subtitle: It's a freak.
match.quote: A freak

match.subtitle: It's a direwolf.
match.quote: That’s a direwolf

match.subtitle: There are no direwolves south of the Wall.
match.quote: There’s not been a direwolf sighted south of the Wall in two hundred years

match.subtitle: Now there are five.
match.quote: There are five of them

match.subtitle: There are five pups.
match.quote: There are five pups

match.subtitle: The direwolf is the sigil of your house.
match.quote: The direwolf is the sigil of your House

match.subtitle: They were meant to have them.
match.quote: Your children were meant to have these pups my lord

match.subtitle: You will train them yourselves.
match.quote: You must train them

match.subtitle: You will feed them yourselves.
match.quote: If you want these pups you will feed them yourselves

match.subtitle: I'm not a Stark.
match.quote: I am no Stark Father

match.subtitle: What is it?
match.quote: What is it Jon

match.subtitle: I am so sorry, my love.
match.quote: I am so sorry my love

match.subtitle: Jon Arryn is dead.
match.quote: Jon Arryn is dead

match.subtitle: Your sister, the boy?
match.quote: Your sister

match.subtitle: The king rides for Winterfell...
match.quote: The king is riding to Winterfell to seek you out

match.subtitle: Winterfell is yours.
match.quote: Winterfell is yours

match.subtitle: Take me to your crypt.
match.quote: Take me down to your crypt Eddard

match.subtitle: I want to pay my respects.
match.quote: I would pay my respects

match.subtitle: Tell me about Jon Arryn.
match.quote: Tell me about Jon

match.subtitle: burned right through him, whatever it was.
match.quote: It burned right through him

match.subtitle: I loved that man.
match.quote: I loved that old man

match.subtitle: We both did.
match.quote: We both did

match.subtitle: I need you, Ned, down at King's Landing, not up here where you're no damn use to anybody.
match.quote: I have need of you Ned

match.subtitle: Lord Eddard Stark...
match.quote: Lord Eddard Stark I would name you the Hand of the King

match.subtitle: I would name you the Hand of the King.
match.quote: Lord Eddard Stark I would name you the Hand of the King

match.subtitle: I'm not worthy of the honor.
match.quote: I am not worthy of the honor

match.subtitle: I'm trying to get you to run my kingdom while I eat, drink and whore my way to an early grave.
match.quote: I am planning to make you run the kingdom and fight the wars while I eat and drink and wench myself into an early grave

match.subtitle: Damn it, Ned, stand up.
match.quote: Damn it Ned

match.subtitle: You helped me win the Iron Throne, now help me keep the damn thing.
match.quote: You helped me win this damnable throne now help me hold it

match.subtitle: We were meant to rule together.
match.quote: We were meant to rule together

match.subtitle: If your sister had lived, we'd have been bound by blood.
match.quote: If Lyanna had lived we should have been brothers bound by blood as well as affection

match.subtitle: Well, it's not too late.
match.quote: Well it is not too late

match.subtitle: I have a son, you have a daughter.
match.quote: I have a son

match.subtitle: I have a son, you have a daughter.
match.quote: You have a daughter

match.subtitle: We'll join our houses.
match.quote: My Joff and your Sansa shall join our houses as Lyanna and I might once have done

match.subtitle: Did you have to bury her in a place like this?
match.quote: Ah damn it Ned did you have to bury her in a place like this

match.subtitle: She should be on a hill somewhere with the sun and the clouds above her.
match.quote: She should be on a hill somewhere under a fruit tree with the sun and clouds above her and the rain to wash her clean

match.subtitle: This is where she belongs.
match.quote: This is her place

match.subtitle: In my dreams, I kill him every night.
match.quote: In my dreams I kill him every night

match.subtitle: Look, a gift from Illyrio.
match.quote: A gift from the Magister Illyrio

match.subtitle: Touch it.
match.quote: Touch it

match.subtitle: Go on, feel the fabric.
match.quote: Go on

match.subtitle: Go on, feel the fabric.
match.quote: Caress the fabric

match.subtitle: Illyrio's no fool.
match.quote: Illyrio is no fool

match.subtitle: He knows I won't forget my friends when I come into my throne.
match.quote: The magister knows that I will not forget my friends when I come into my throne

match.subtitle: You still slouch.
match.quote: You still slouch

match.subtitle: Let them see.
match.quote: Let them see that you have a womans shape now

match.subtitle: You have a woman's body now.
match.quote: Let them see that you have a womans shape now

match.subtitle: You don't want to wake the dragon, do you?
match.quote: You don’t want to wake the dragon do you

match.subtitle: No.
match.quote: No

match.subtitle: When they write the history of my reign, sweet sister, they will say it began today.
match.quote: When they write the history of my reign sweet sister they will say that it began tonight

match.subtitle: Viserys of House Targaryen, the third of his name, the rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, and his sister, Daenerys of House Targaryen.
match.quote: Viserys of the House Targaryen the Third of his Name

match.subtitle: Viserys of House Targaryen, the third of his name, the rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, and his sister, Daenerys of House Targaryen.
match.quote: King of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm

match.subtitle: Viserys of House Targaryen, the third of his name, the rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, and his sister, Daenerys of House Targaryen.
match.quote: His sister, Daenerys Stormborn, Princess of Dragonstone.

match.subtitle: Do you see how long his hair is?
match.quote: You see how long it is

match.subtitle: When Dothraki are defeated in combat they cut off their braid so the whole world can see their shame.
match.quote: When Dothraki are defeated in combat they cut off their braids in disgrace so the world will know their shame

match.subtitle: Khal Drogo has never been defeated.
match.quote: Khal Drogo has never lost a fight

match.subtitle: And you will be his queen.
match.quote: He is Aegon the Dragonlord come again and you will be his queen

match.subtitle: They cry out for their true king.
match.quote: They cry out for their king.

match.subtitle: Do you take me for a fool?
match.quote: Do you take me for a fool

match.subtitle: I take you for a king.
match.quote: I take you for a king

match.subtitle: Kings lack the caution of common men.
match.quote: Kings lack the caution of common men

match.subtitle: My apologies if I've given offense.
match.quote: My apologies if I have given offense

match.subtitle: I don't want to be his queen.
match.quote: I don’t want to be his queen

match.subtitle: I want to go home.
match.quote: Please please Viserys I don’t want to I want to go home

match.subtitle: So tell me, sweet sister, how do we go home?
match.quote: How are we to go home sweet sister

match.subtitle: I don't know.
match.quote: I don’t know…

match.subtitle: We go home with an army.
match.quote: We go home with an army sweet sister

match.subtitle: With Khal Drogo's army.
match.quote: With Khal Drogo’s army that is how we go home

match.subtitle: I would let his whole tribe fuck you, all 40,000 men and their horses too, if that's what it took.
match.quote: I’d let his whole khalasar fuck you if need be sweet sister all forty thousand men and their horses too if that was what it took to get my army

match.subtitle: Why aren't you at the feast?
match.quote: Why aren't you at the feast?

match.subtitle: Lady Stark thought it might insult the royal family to seat a bastard in their midst.
match.quote: But tonight Lady Stark thought it might give insult to the royal family to seat a bastard among them

match.subtitle: So take me with you when you go back.
match.quote: Take me with you when you go back to the Wall

match.subtitle: Father will let me if you ask him.
match.quote: Father will give me leave to go if you ask him I know he will

match.subtitle: I know he will.
match.quote: Father will give me leave to go if you ask him I know he will

match.subtitle: I'm ready to swear your oath.
match.quote: I am ready to swear your oath

match.subtitle: You don't understand what you'd be giving up.
match.quote: Until you have known a woman you cannot understand what you would be giving up

match.subtitle: We have no families.
match.quote: We have no families

match.subtitle: None of us will ever father sons.
match.quote: None of us will ever father sons

match.subtitle: I don't care about that.
match.quote: I don’t care about that

match.subtitle: You might, if you knew what it meant.
match.quote: You might if you knew what it meant

match.subtitle: What are you doing back there?
match.quote: What are you doing up there

match.subtitle: And you, you're Ned Stark's bastard, aren't you?
match.quote: You’re Ned Stark’s bastard aren’t you

match.subtitle: Did I offend you?
match.quote: Did I offend you

match.subtitle: You are the bastard, though.
match.quote: You are the bastard though

match.subtitle: Lord Eddard Stark is my father.
match.quote: Lord Eddard Stark is my father

match.subtitle: Let me give you some advice, bastard.
match.quote: Let me give you some counsel bastard

match.subtitle: Never forget what you are.
match.quote: Never forget what you are for surely the world will not

match.subtitle: The rest of the world will not.
match.quote: Never forget what you are for surely the world will not

match.subtitle: and it can never be used to hurt you.
match.quote: Armor yourself in it and it will never be used to hurt you

match.subtitle: What the hell do you know about being a bastard?
match.quote: What do you know about being a bastard

match.subtitle: All dwarves are bastards in their father's eyes.
match.quote: All dwarfs are bastards in their father’s eyes

match.subtitle: It's Maester Luwin, my lord.
match.quote: My lord Maester Luwin is without and begs urgent audience

match.subtitle: Send him in.
match.quote: Send him in

match.subtitle: Pardon, my lord, my lady.
match.quote: My lord

match.subtitle: She says Jon Arryn was murdered.
match.quote: Lysa says Jon Arryn was murdered

match.subtitle: By the Lannisters.
match.quote: The Lannisters

match.subtitle: She doesn't know what she's saying.
match.quote: She cannot know what she is saying

match.subtitle: Your father and brother rode south once on a king's demand.
match.quote: My father went south once to answer the summons of a king

match.subtitle: A different time.
match.quote: A different time

match.subtitle: A different king.
match.quote: A different king

match.subtitle: If Khal Drogo has promised you a crown, you shall have it.
match.quote: The khal has promised you a crown and you shall have it

match.subtitle: When their omens favor war.
match.quote: If the omens favor war

match.subtitle: I piss on Dothraki omens.
match.quote: I piss on Dothraki omens

match.subtitle: A Dothraki wedding without at least three deaths is considered a dull affair.
match.quote: A Dothraki wedding without at least three deaths is deemed a dull affair

match.subtitle: Dragon's eggs, Daenerys, from the Shadow Lands beyond Asshai.
match.quote: Dragon’s eggs from the Shadow Lands beyond Asshai

match.subtitle: The ages have turned them to stone, but they will always be beautiful.
match.quote: The eons have turned them to stone yet still they burn bright with beauty

match.subtitle: She's beautiful.
match.quote: She's beautiful.

match.subtitle: Do you know the common tongue?
match.quote: You speak the Common Tongue

match.subtitle: No.
match.quote: No

match.subtitle: Is "no" the only word that you know?
match.quote: Is that the only word you know

match.subtitle: No.
match.quote: No

match.subtitle: How old are you, boy?
match.quote: How old are you boy

match.subtitle: The things I do for love.
match.quote: The things I do for love
